name: Alcohol attitudes
description: Support for changes to help reduce problems associated with alcohol use.

name: Alcohol cutting back
description: Thoughts about reducing the amount of alcohol consumed.

name: Alcohol consumption
description: Levels of consumption of alcoholic drinks, including risky drinking.

name: Meal preparation
description: Number of days in a week that the main meal was prepared at home or bought from outside of home.

name: Eating habits within households
description: How often households eat their main meal together.

name: Gambling participation
description: Involvement in at least one gambling activity (eg, buying a Lotto ticket) in the past 12 months.

name: Gambling participation frequency
description: New Zealanders' gambling frequency and type of gambling.

name: Gambling harm
description: Experiences of harm from gambling, both to themselves and to others.

name: Attitudes to gambling harm
description: Attitudes to level of gambling harm and knowledge of what to do to help family/friends who gamble too much.

name: Gaming machines and pokies
description: Use of gaming machines or pokies, and amount spent on average.

name: Wellbeing
description: Views on maintaining a strong connection to culture and feelings of isolation.

name: Mental distress
description: Whether ever diagnosed with mental illness.

name: Experience of discrimination
description: New Zealanders' experiences of discrimination and willingness to disclose experience of mental illness or distress.

name: Te reo Māori
description: Views by Māori New Zealanders on being involved in things to do with Māori culture.

name: Cultural connectedness
description: Ability of Māori New Zealanders to speak Māori in day-to-day conversation.

name: Sunburn
description: Whether people were sunburnt in spring and summer (September to February).

name: Sun protective behaviours (and skin checks)
description: Behaviours used to protect from sunburn (and skin checks).

name: Attitudes to tobacco
description: Attitudes to, and knowledge of, tobacco use in New Zealand.

name: Quit smoking
description: Number of serious attempts to stop smoking in the past 12 months.

name: Current smoking
description: Smoking status of New Zealanders, for example as current smokers, past smokers etc.

name: Vaping / e-cigarettes
description: New Zealanders' levels of vaping/e-cigarette use and reasons for vaping.
